content.question: In the second and third sentences of the second paragraph (“It was inspired . . . that awful struggle”), the author represents the Pact of Paris as

choices.label: a temporary solution to a long-standing problem
the unexpected outgrowth of a volatile situation
the hopeful result of traumatic experiences

content.answer: the hopeful result of traumatic experiences

skill.text: Skill 5.C: Recognize and explain the use of methods of development to accomplish a purpose.
